title: I would like to have 11 RP to buy something
body: I was wondering if anyone could tell me how to get a couple RP? Your help would be appreciated. :D

replies.body: You can send your request for a small amount of RP once to Riot Support through a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or tweet [@RiotSupport](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport) on Twitter. They will probably request some original League artwork from you in return, but don't worry, you don't have to be an artist! You can draw something with stick figures, write a haiku, or even express yourself through interpretive dance while dressed as your favorite champion!
Ok thank you so much for the help i'm gonna go do that now? :D
DTN has provided some solid information, and this is something we might be able to help with.  Submitting a ticket or sending a tweet are certainly your best bet.  Good luck!
